trans-unit.source: Contains advanced properties for key creation.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder avanserte egenskaper for oppretting.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> objects contain properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>objekter inneholder egenskaper.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: Some properties must be added to a key when it is created.
trans-unit.target: Noen egenskaper må legges til en nøkkel når den opprettes.

trans-unit.source: Other properties can be added after the key is created.
trans-unit.target: Kan legges til andre egenskaper etter nøkkelen er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The CngKeyCreationParameters class enables you to add properties to a key as it is being created.
trans-unit.target: Klassen CngKeyCreationParameters kan du legge til egenskapene til en nøkkel som den opprettes.

trans-unit.source: You can do this by passing a CngKeyCreationParameters object that contains standard key properties, such as key storage provider (KSP), export policy, key usage, user interface (UI) policy, and parent window handle, to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Create%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gjøre dette ved å sende en CngKeyCreationParameters-objekt som inneholder key standardegenskapene, for eksempel key lagringsleverandøren (KSP), eksport policy, nøkkelbruk, brukerpolicy brukergrensesnittet (UI) og overordnet vindusreferansen til den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Create%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Create%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object that is being created will be initialized with these values before it is finalized.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>objekt som blir opprettet blir initialisert med disse verdiene før den er fullført.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: You can also add non-standard properties to a key by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters.Parameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også legge til ikke-standard egenskapene til en nøkkel ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters.Parameters%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters.Parameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to add properties after a key is created, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.SetProperty%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til egenskaper etter en nøkkel er opprettet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.SetProperty%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.SetProperty%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key export policy.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir nøkkeleksport policyen.

trans-unit.source: For information about key export policies, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngExportPolicies> class.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om nøkkeleksport policyene, se <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngExportPolicies>klasse.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngExportPolicies>

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies a key export policy.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som angir en nøkkeleksport policy.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the key storage provider's default export policy is set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at det key lagringsleverandøren standardpolicy eksport er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key creation options.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir alternativene oppretting.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationOptions> object defines options that are used when you create a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object.
trans-unit.target: Det returnerte <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationOptions>objektet definerer alternativene som brukes når du oppretter en ny <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationOptions>

trans-unit.source: These options determine whether the key is created in the user or machine key store, and whether a new key should overwrite an existing key.
trans-unit.target: Disse alternativene bestemmer om nøkkelen er opprettet i bruker- eller maskinkonto key store, og om en ny nøkkel skal skrive over en eksisterende nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: By default, if <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationOptions?displayProperty=fullName> is not specified, the key is created in the user store.
trans-unit.target: Som standard hvis <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationOptions?displayProperty=fullName>ikke er angitt, nøkkelen er opprettet i bruker-butikken.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationOptions?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies options for creating keys.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som angir alternativer for å opprette nøkler.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the key storage provider's default key creation options are set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at den key lagringsleverandøren oppretting standardalternativer er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cryptographic operations that apply to the current key.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir de kryptografiske operasjonene som gjelder for gjeldende nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: This property is used when you create a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes når du oppretter en ny <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: It specifies the usages (such as encryption/decryption, signing/verification, and secret agreement generation) that will be enabled on the new key.
trans-unit.target: Den angir bruksområder (for eksempel Kryptering/dekryptering logger/bekreftelse og hemmelig avtale generering) som blir aktivert på den nye nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of one or more enumeration values that specify key usage.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av én eller flere nummereringsverdier som angir nøkkelbruk.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the key storage provider's default key usage is set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at det key lagringsleverandøren standard nøkkelbruk er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Enables a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> object to be created with additional properties that are set before the key is finalized.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"> </xref> objektet som opprettes med flere egenskaper som er angitt før nøkkelen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters> class enables you to create a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object and initialize it with common properties.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters>klassen kan du opprette en ny <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>objekt og initialisere med vanlige egenskaper.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters>

trans-unit.source: If you must set additional properties on the key during its creation, follow these steps: 1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du må angi tilleggsegenskaper nøkkelen under den ble opprettet, følge disse trinnene: 1.

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty> object for each additional property that you must set.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en ny <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty>objekt for hver ekstra egenskap må du angi.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty>

trans-unit.source: Call the Parameters property to obtain an empty <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngPropertyCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Kall Parameters-egenskapen for å få et tomt <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngPropertyCollection>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngPropertyCollection>

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty> objects to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngPropertyCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Legg til den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty>objekter til den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngPropertyCollection>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngPropertyCollection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Create%28System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters%29> method overload and pass the initialized <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters> object to it.
trans-unit.target: Kall til <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Create%28System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters%29>metoden overbelaste og sende initialisert <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters>objekt til det.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Create%28System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters%29>

trans-unit.source: A collection object that contains any additional parameters that you must set on a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> object during key creation.
trans-unit.target: En samlingsobjekt som inneholder flere parametere som du må angi på en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"> </xref> objekt under oppretting.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the window handle that should be used as the parent window for dialog boxes that are created by Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) classes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir vindusreferansen som skal brukes som det overordnede vinduet for dialogbokser som er opprettet av Databasekryptografinøkkelen neste generasjon (CNG) klasser.

trans-unit.source: This property should be set if key creation causes CNG to show a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen må angis hvis oppretting fører til at CNG skal vises en dialogboks.

trans-unit.source: The HWND of the parent window that is used for CNG dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: HWND vinduets overordnet som brukes for CNG dialogbokser.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key storage provider (KSP) to create a key in.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir nøkkelen lagringsleverandøren (KSP) for å opprette en nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the KSP that a new key will be created in.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som angir KSP opprettes en ny nøkkel i.

trans-unit.source: The Provider property is set to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen er satt til en <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets information about the user interface to display when a key is created or accessed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir informasjon om brukergrensesnittet skal vises når en nøkkel er opprettet eller tilgang til.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains details about the user interface shown by Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) classes when a key is created or accessed.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder informasjon om brukergrensesnittet vises av kryptografi neste generasjon (CNG) klasser når en nøkkel er opprettet eller tilgang til.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> value indicates that the key storage provider's default user interface policy is set.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> verdien angir at det key lagringsleverandøren bruker grensesnittet standardpolicy er angitt.
